WARNING

PRIOR USING THE HAT, CHECK FOR TEARS IN THE INNER LINING AND DO NOT USE IF ANY GEL IS VISIBLE / DO NOT USE ON CHILDREN UNDER AGE 10 / DO NOT USE IF YOU ARE PREGNANT OR NURSING OR IF YOU HAVE HEART DISEASE, DIABETES, SKIN PROBLEMS OR ANY CIRCULATORY PROBLEMS / DO NOT WEAR IF TOO COLD OR WARM TO TOUCH WITH YOUR FINGERS / APPLY ON DRY SKIN ONLY / NEVER WEAR YOUR COLD OR WARM HAT MORE THAN 30 MINUTES STRAIGHT / DO NOT MICROWAVE MORE THAN 20 SECONDS INCREMENTS / DO NOT APPLY TO AREAS WITH POOR BLOOD CIRCULATION OR ON ANY WOUNDS / IF FOR ANY REASON THE GEL COMES IN CONTACT WITH THE SKIN OR EYES, IMMEDIATELY WASH THE AREA WITH SOAP AND WATER / IF FOR ANY REASON YOU HAVE AN ALLERGIC REACTION, CLEAN THE AREA WITH SOAP AND WATER AND CONSULT YOUR DOCTOR / IF PAIN CONTINUES OR GET WORSE, CONSULT A PHYSICIAN AND/OR SEEK MEDICAL ATTENTION.

settings.faq-title: How does CompressMD‚Ñ¢Ô∏è "Targeted Nano-Fiber" work?
settings.faq-subtitle: CompressMD‚Ñ¢Ô∏è are socks that use compression zone technology. With specialized weaves of strong elastic to create pressure on the muscles in the legs, ankles and feet, the pain relief is almost instant. The socks are tighter at the bottom than they are on top, which gently pushes the blood from the bottom of your foot up the top. This helps improve blood circulation and reduce swelling, alleviating pain in your ankle, feet, and legs.

settings.faq-title: What kind of pain does this help with?
settings.faq-subtitle: CompressMD‚Ñ¢Ô∏è help relieve pain due to plantar fasciitis, achilles tendonitis, feet that fall asleep, flat feet, throbbing and burning nerve foot pain, arthritis, heel strike pain, weak and lazy legs, edeme, arch pain, foot injury, heel spurs, and foot injuries.

settings.faq-title: Is this safe to use?
settings.faq-subtitle: The CompressMD‚Ñ¢Ô∏è compression socks are safe in most instances. However if you suffer from peripheral arterial disease or congestive heart failure, then you should ask your doctor about the advantages of SootheSocks Compression Socks before using them.

settings.faq-title: Who should wear these?
settings.faq-subtitle: If you stand all day at work or at home, have circulation problems, suffer from foot, heel, or leg pain, or simply want to get relief from heavy, swollen, legs, then the CompressMD‚Ñ¢Ô∏è Compression Socks are for you.

settings.faq-title: Can I Wear CompressMD‚Ñ¢Ô∏è Socks For Plantar Fasciitis At Night?
settings.faq-subtitle: Yes, compression socks can help to provide some relief while you sleep and for those first few painful steps in the morning. If you are like most people who suffer from plantar fasciitis pain, taking that first step out of bed every morning is generally the most painful time of day. This is, in part, because your plantar fascia rests in a shortened position while you sleep and is stretched quickly (and painfully!) with those first few steps. The light compression and mild arch support may help reduce the pain in those first steps out of bed in the morning.

settings.faq-title: Can I return my order?
settings.faq-subtitle: The 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee is our way of ensuring your complete satisfaction with our products. If you are not satisfied with the product, then let us know within 30 calendar days of receiving your order, and we will give you a full refund. The company might request additional information from the customer in case the device is reported as defective or faulty. The cost of shipping for returned items is covered by customers.

settings.popupheading: <u>Expert Confesses: The Secret To Soothing Foot</u> Problems
settings.maintitle: Why One Of America‚Äôs Top Physical Therapist Says Your ‚ÄúOld Socks‚Äù Could Be Causing Foot Problems
settings.description:
‚á® What‚Äôs the #1 cause of foot problems and foot swelling?

‚á® The ‚Äúold sock‚Äù secret that help ease foot problems.

‚á® The safe at-home ‚Äò5-second morning ritual‚Äô that keeps your feet feeling fresh all day (try this today)

settings.maintitle: ‚ÄúYour nerves have an outer casing like a banana‚Äù says Doctor of Physical Therapy & U.S. Military Veteran, Richard Neumann.
settings.desc1:
He points to a drawing on his wall and continues, ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs the way healthy nerves should look. But in people with foot issues they start to lose their protective coating‚Äù

I‚Äôm with my husband Paul sitting in the esteemed Richard Neumann‚Äôs office, talking about Paul‚Äôs foot neuropathy pain. For the first time ever, it was all making sense.
settings.desc2: ‚ÄúThe problem is, Paul, your neuropathy means that the outer casings around millions of nerves in your feet are being peeled back. And just like leaving an unpeeled banana out in the air, your nerves are shriveling up and dying‚Ä¶ which is causing the pain, tingling, and numbness you feel.‚Äù
settings.desc3: So that led to Paul and I asking the same question‚Ä¶.

settings.maintitle: Is There Anything You Can Do About Foot Problems (Neuropathy Pain)?
settings.desc1:
Most experts will tell you there‚Äôs not much you can do for damaged nerves in the feet.

But if you‚Äôve been in agony with foot pain then hearing ‚Äúthere‚Äôs nothing you can do‚Äù can be frustrating.

But Dr. Richard Neumann has some good news‚Ä¶.
settings.desc2:
Multiple studies performed by scientists have shown that a deep tissue massage can offer dramatic relief from foot discomfort.

The problem is, most people don‚Äôt have the time or money to get several professional foot massages a day.
settings.maintitle2: But NOW there‚Äôs something that has changed all that‚Ä¶
settings.desc3: ‚ÄúIt sounds strange, but I‚Äôve been giving my patients special massage socks to help with their foot problems‚Äù , says Dr. Neumann.

settings.maintitle: CompressMD‚Ñ¢ use compression technology to squeeze certain points of the foot to improve blood flow and soothe nerve pain
settings.desc1:
The socks have been designed by a team of pain management experts and podiatrists. The company is called mLab and what they‚Äôve done is remarkable.

They‚Äôve developed a breakthrough fabric and weaving structure unlike anything else. The result is a revolutionary sock with 5 ‚Äúcompression zones‚Äù that actively massage key areas of the feet, to soothe neuropathy pain.
settings.desc2: ‚ÄúMany of my patients wear these socks all day and never have foot problems again. They say it‚Äôs just like having a massage therapist working on their feet 24/7‚Äù
settings.desc3:
Honestly, it sounds too good to be true. But Dr. Neumann insists that anyone with foot pain give them a try.

And so we did!

‚ÄúNo way these things are gonna do anything,‚Äù my husband said, tossing the socks on the table.

But I convinced him to give them a shot, just for a day.

Within seconds Paul‚Äôs eyes lit up.

‚ÄúOK, These definitely feel different. It‚Äôs like they‚Äôre pushing the stabbing out of my feet. This is amazing, It‚Äôs like someone‚Äôs giving me a massage!‚Äù he says, grinning ear to ear.
settings.desc2: UPDATE: It‚Äôs now been 6 weeks and we couldn‚Äôt live without CompressMD‚Ñ¢Ô∏è. Paul's stabbing pain, tingling, or numbness have eased considerably and he‚Äôs back to his old self. Things have never been better between us. I have my husband back.

settings.maintitle: Why They Work So Well
settings.desc1:
It‚Äôs because they use breakthrough ‚Äúcompression zone‚Äù technology to apply soothing pressure to areas of the feet that need it most.

The extra blood flow keeps those nerves in your feet healthy, which means you enjoy‚Ä¶

settings.title2: Feet that almost never feel numb or tingly

settings.quotetext: ‚ÄúUnbelievable results: perfect arch, heel AND ankle support!‚Äù ‚Äî Cheryl D.
settings.subheading: Traditional Bath Towels: Breeding Grounds for Mildew & Odors?
settings.desc:
Most towels are made of cheap cotton or synthetic blends that are virtually impossible to dry out completely. Since these fabrics retain so much moisture, they can harbor mildew, bacterial odors, and other nasty particles.

So, every time you dry off with a damp towel, you‚Äôre not only making yourself instantly dirty again, you may actually be rubbing mildew & odor-causing bacteria onto your skin.

According to Chuck Gerba, PhD, a professor of microbiology at the University of Arizona, drying-off with a dirty towel can be risky.1

settings.subheading: Ordinary Bath Towels Don‚Äôt Stay Clean...But What Can Be Done?
settings.desc:
In most bathrooms, the towel-drying bar is located about 7' away from the nastiest thing in the house: the toilet. We all assume this is okay‚Ä¶ but in a 2013 study, scientists proved that the particles in toilets spray all around the room (a phenomenon nown as ‚Äútoilet plume‚Äù).2

What can be done? You can do what experts recommend by washing or replacing your towels every 3 days, but who has the time or energy for that? You could stop hanging up towels in the bathroom altogether, but walking to the linen closet with wet feet creates a real slipping hazard.

But what if there was a smart, easy solution to help keep bath towels clean, dry, and fresh-smelling without sacrificing comfort and quality?

settings.featurestext: Silver Ions Help Resist Odors & Mildew

settings.subheading: Stop Using Damp, Dirty Towels And Switch To This Innovative New Solution
settings.featuresbutton: CLICK HERE FOR FREE HAND TOWELS ON SELECT ORDERS ‚â´
settings.desc1:
Sutera Silverthread Towels" are a luxury bathroom breakthrough that offers a clean, dry, fresh-smelling way to dry-off after each and every shower.

Forget about exposing yourself to mildew and musty odors after showering: Silverthread Towels are infused with Silver Ions ‚Äî shown in scientific studies to help fabrics resist mildew and bacterial odors.3

Silverthread‚Äôs 100% CA-Grown Pima Cotton is woven into a unique waffle-weave texture, which dries your body faster than conventional towels and allows for complete moisture evaporation, so towels air-dry in minutes.
settings.desc2:
Thousands of Americans are moving away from traditional towels to Sutera‚Äôs cleaner, fresher, and more luxurious innovation.

But fair warning: the word about Silverthread Towels is spreading like wildfire and most customers are buying in bundles to claim their free hand towels (up to 4 FREE).

We strongly suggest ordering now and claiming up to 4 FREE hand towels, before inventory runs low or supplies completely sell out again. (Available in both White and Grey Color, but check the next page for inventory as one color could be sold out already!)

settings.subheading: How Do Silverthread Towels Stay Fresher For Longer?
settings.desc:
Silver has been used for centuries to help keep wounds clean, and surgeons still use it to this day. In an extraordinary recent breakthrough, scientists discovered a way to infuse silver ions into fabrics ‚Äî helping the fabric naturally resist mildew and bacterial odors.2

To create Silverthread Towels, we infused these innovative silver ions into ultra-soft, 100% California-grown Pima cotton. The silver ions are ‚Äúactivated‚Äù whenever any excess moisture exists in the fabric, leaving the towels clean and fresh-smelling.

So, the Silver Ion infusion is how Sutera Silverthread Towels stay fresher than regular towels!

They‚Äôre also why Silverthread Towels can be washed less frequently than conventional towels ‚Äî yet still look, smell, and feel cleaner.

settings.subheading: They Feel Softer, Look More Elegant, & Last Longer Than Store-Bought Towels
settings.desc:
100% of the fabric in every Silverthread Towel is made from California-grown Pima Cotton. American grown Pima cotton is quite possibly the highest-quality cotton in the world. Its staple fibers can be up to 30-50% longer than Egyptian cotton‚Ä¶ producing softer, more durable fabrics that are more resistant to ‚Äúpilling.‚Äù

Silverthread‚Äôs luxurious, European-style waffle pattern features two types of weaves ‚Äî each with a different function. The smooth loose-weave makes each towel strong and long-lasting; the open-weave accounts for its moisture-wicking and rapid-evaporation properties.

This unique texture is why Silverthread is more lightweight than ordinary towels, yet absorbs more moisture and air-dries more completely. You‚Äôll literally fell it drying and warming your body. In-between showers, touch your Silverthread Towel with dry hands and you‚Äôll notice no lingering dampness or odor!

settings.subheading: How Does Sutera Silverthread Compare To Regular Bath Towels?
settings.desc1:
When I first saw this towel online, I was a complete skeptic‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs really supposed to keep mildew and odors at bay? To me, it sounded ‚Äútoo good to be true.‚Äù But I knew the brand, Sutera, had a good reputation for quality products. I skimmed through the rave reviews and was convinced to try it.

Right off the bat, I noticed Silverthread felt softer than I expected. It was a pleasant sensation: it feels plush, elegant... more than anything, it feels like quality. I‚Äôm a huge Pima cotton fan, and this fabric does not disappoint: it feels strong yet lightweight, smooth yet breathable.

I gave it a shot that same day. I went through my usual shower routine, but one thing immediately stood out: I was fully dry before I knew it. I hung the half-damp towel like I always do and checked back after about 15 minutes. Normally, my towel would still be cold-to-the-touch and dripping wet at this time, but I was shocked to find it dry as a bone.
settings.desc2:
After a couple weeks of use, I can confidently say: Silverthread is the last towel I will ever use. It gets the job done better than any other towel, and it doesn‚Äôt ever smell musty. Plus, I love not having to worry about washing it all the time because it stays clean for weeks.

BOTTOM LINE: If you‚Äôre tired of your towels never drying out completely, plus getting nasty and musty fast‚Ä¶ if you‚Äôre concerned about damp towels rubbing mildew and odors all over your skin‚Ä¶ or if you simply want towels you don‚Äôt have to wash every 3 days... Sutera Silverthread Towels are a truly innovative, classy, & convenient product. I highly recommend them.

Knee issues keep coming back and current solutions are not fixing the underlying causes.

After years of research & development, interviews and countless of prototypes & tests, the team at MassageLab carefully engineered the 3 most important elements against knee pain.

settings.title: Wormwood

settings.description: Ginger is rich in compounds with numerous beneficial health effects. It has antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties which help alleviate local pain by warming and soothing the affected area.

settings.title: Radix Aconiti
settings.description: Clinically proven to increase blood flow and enhance blood supply of veins. It helps supply damaged areas with nutrient rich blood and oxygen to boost recovery.

settings.description: Capsaicin is used to help relieve pain associated with rheumatoid arthritis and muscle sprains and strains like a meniscus tear.
